The provided chunk is part of a Python file that defines a `wx.Panel`-based user interface component called `ObjectPaletteUI`. This panel implements a tree control for organizing and displaying objects, complete with context menu functionality to sort items alphabetically or in their original order. The code sets up the UI elements using wxPython and custom controls, and it is situated at the beginning of the file where the class definition starts.

"""

import wx
from .PaletteTreeCtrl import PaletteTreeCtrl
